hackathon-eligibility: Journalists, developers, designers are encouraged to participate in the hackathon.
hackathon-rules: You're welcome to come up with ideas and sketch things out beforehand.  Start coding at the hackathon.  You are welcome to start coding before, but for prizes we'd like to keep it to projects built at the hackathon.
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=MIT Media Lab, Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Amherst Street, Cambridge, MA 02139, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: The focus of the hackathon is mobile, this will be part of the judging criteria
How does the product look and feel
This only matters for the specific best of API prizes, not for the general prizes

hackathon-location-address: MIT Media Lab, Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Amherst Street, Cambridge, MA 02139, USA
hackathon-description-header: A hackathon to rethink how we create, disseminate, and consume media on mobile.
